overview: HCS and Steinhaus Productions present IBEREN BILD! A brand new exciting and dramatic show that took place Chol Hamoed Sukkos 5780 (2019). Featuring some of the top performers in the Jewish Entertainment world to date. The show took place in the masterful NJAPC in Newark NJ exclusively for HCS Families and families of children with special needs.
title: Iberen Bild
